duties_responsibilities.duty: Review conflicts reports for new business and identify potential conflicts of interest.
Prepare conflicts summary outlining conflict results for Firm lawyers.
Assist in the new business intake process and drafting of engagement letters and waivers.
Stay current with laws and rules pertaining to conflicts of interest for each jurisdiction.
Maintain records for tracking conflicts review projects.
Review conflicts questionnaires submitted by lateral hire candidates.
Prepare comprehensive conflicts summary for lateral partner candidates.
Participate in discussions to streamline the lateral hire clearing process.

education_certification.credential: Juris Doctor (J.D.) degree and admitted to the practice of law in the U.S.
